players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
You: "I think Charlie is mafia. Bob was killed, and Charlie is the only other player left."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia. I am not mafia."
Diana: "I think Alice is mafia. She was the only other villager and her accusation of Charlie seems suspicious. Maybe she’s trying to deflect."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
